prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that has a mischievous grin and a shadowy appearance.
Imagine a spooky Pokemon with purple skin and bright red eyes lurking in the shadows.
Generate a playful ghost Pokemon that loves to scare trainers but is actually friendly.
Design a Pokemon that floats around with a round body and sharp teeth, causing mischief.
Give me a creature that embodies darkness and trickery, with a unique shape and color.
Show me an eerie Pokemon that hovers in the air, with a playful yet sinister vibe.
Make a whimsical ghost-type Pokemon that loves to play pranks and has a spooky aura.
